issue.title: A reference is not an object

blockquote.p: -12- Objects passed to member functions of a container as rvalue references shall not be elements of that container. No diagnostic required.

discussion.p: A reference is not an object, but this sentence appears to claim so.

blockquote.p: An object bound to an rvalue reference parameter of a member function of a container shall not be an element of that container; no diagnostic required.
